scripts.ikclean: rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json .next/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm i && npm update && npm audit fix --force && npm outdated
scripts.ikclean2: rm -fr node_modules/ package-lock.json .next/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm i && npm outdated
scripts.ikcleanci: rm -fr node_modules/ .next/ && npm cache clean -vf && npm ci && npm outdated
scripts.server: npm run build && npm run start
